verses.text: Ayic ayek' winh t'a yol sk'ool nok' chay chi', ix lesalwi winh t'a Jehová sDiosal. Ix yalan winh icha tik:
Mamin Jehová, a wal t'a skal in yaelal ix in awaj t'ayach. Ix ach tak'wi t'ayin ayic ayinek' t'a chamel. Ata' ix in awaj t'ayach, ix ab'an tas ix wala'.
Ato t'a sjulal yich ha' mar ix in a yumcanemi, junelnhej ix yoy sb'a ha ha' t'ayin. Ha ha' niwac ha' ix laj ek' t'a wib'anh.
Ata' ix in na' to ix in ik'kanel t'a ichanh t'a junelnhej, a walani to manhxa b'ak'uinh ol wil a templo to ic yaji.
Ix in mucchajkanem t'a sjulal yich ha' mar chi'. Ix och b'ak'an juntzanh anh anh k'ultac ay t'a yol ha' chi' t'a in jolom.
Ix in emkan t'a yichtac juntzanh witz t'a yol ha' chi'. Junelnhej ix in kan ta' walani, palta a ach tik Jehová in Diosal ach, ix in a colcanel t'a chamel.
Axo yic wanxo slajwi in k 'inal ix wab'i, ix ach in naancot Mamin. Ix k'och in lesal t'a ichanh t'a a templo.
Ha heb' slaj yak'em sb'ha t'a yechel comon Dios malaj yelk'ochi, spatiquejkanel a wach'k'olal heb' tza nib'ej tzak' t'a heb'.
Palta a inxo tik, ol wak' in silab' t'ayach yuj wak'an yuj diosal t'ayach. Ol in k'anab'ajej b'aj ix wak' in ti' t'ayach. Ha achxonhej syal a kolwaj Mamin Jehová, xchi winhaj Jonás chi'.
Ixlajwi chi', haxo Jehová ix chekanb'at nok' niwan chay chi', yic b'at xejajkanel winhaj Jonás chi' yuj nok' t'a sti' ha' mar chi'.
